short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered browser assistant that performs actions based on natural language instructions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your AI assistant that can navigate the web and help with tasks.

Just tell Web Copilot what you want to get done. It can navigate to websites, fill out forms, perform clicks, scroll and understand the content on your screen:

• "Book me the cheapest flight to Tokyo for next week"
• "Find me a good ramen place open now and get directions"
• "Is this a good price for a MacBook? Check other stores"
• "What are the key points from this article?"
• "Fill in my details on this form"
• "Are there any student discounts mentioned here?"
• "Close all the popups on this page"

Skip the manual work - tell Web Copilot what you want and watch it get things done.

Stop browsing. Start doing.

Note: Requires an Anthropic API key to work.
